channel.title: CVE Feed for HasThemes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HasThemes -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-29926|2024-03-27T07:27:32.955Z -- HasThemes -- WC Builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes WC Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WC Builder: from n/a through 1.0.18.

item.title: CVE-2024-29094|2024-03-19T16:38:15.372Z -- HasThemes -- HT Easy GA4 ( Google Analytics 4 )
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes HT Easy GA4 ( Google Analytics 4 ) allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HT Easy GA4 ( Google Analytics 4 ): from n/a through 1.1.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-29102|2024-03-19T15:47:05.886Z -- HasThemes -- Extensions For CF7
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes Extensions For CF7 allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Extensions For CF7: from n/a through 3.0.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-32782|2024-04-24T07:52:19.918Z -- HasThemes -- HT Mega
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in HasThemes HT Mega.This issue affects HT Mega: from n/a through 2.4.7.

item.title: CVE-2024-30182|2024-03-27T11:46:10.227Z -- HasThemes -- HT Mega
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes HT Mega allows Stored XSS.This issue affects HT Mega: from n/a through 2.4.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-34767|2024-06-03T11:36:31.590Z -- HasThemes -- ShopLentor
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in HasThemes ShopLentor allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ShopLentor: from n/a through 2.8.7.
